org.smartfrog.services.dns
Class DNSServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.smartfrog.services.dns.DNSServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
DNSServiceQuery
public class DNSServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements DNSServiceQuery

A set of client methods to locate compatible services using DNS SRV records.

Method Detail

lookup

public DNSServiceInstance[] lookup()
                            throws DNSException
Performs a look-up of the registered service class using a particular resolver and filtering according to a given criteria. Matching instances are returned in decreasing priority. Multiple requests could return different results since the available instances or priorities could change dynamically. It uses default DNS settings and filters.

Specified by:
lookup in interface DNSServiceQuery
Returns:
An array of service instances matching the criteria and in decreasing priority or an array of lenght zero if no services found.
Throws:
DNSException - if an error occurs while looking up.

lookup

public DNSServiceInstance[] lookup(org.xbill.DNS.Resolver resol,
                                   DNSServiceFilter filter)
                            throws DNSException
Performs a look-up of the registered service class using a particular resolver and filtering according to a given criteria. Matching instances are returned in decreasing priority. Multiple requests could return different results since the available instances or priorities could change dynamically.

Specified by:
lookup in interface DNSServiceQuery
Parameters:
resol - A network connection to resolve the query.
filter - An extra filtering function to be applied to the results or null if no extra filtering is required.
Returns:
An array of service instances matching the criteria and in decreasing priority or an array of lenght zero if no services found.
Throws:
DNSException - if an error occurs while looking up.

findAddress

public static java.net.InetAddress findAddress(org.xbill.DNS.Resolver resol,
                                               org.xbill.DNS.Name hostName)
Finds an address for a host name. If it cannot find it, just return null (i.e., no exception). If there are more than one, just return the first one.

Parameters:
resol - A network connection to the DNS server to resolve the query.
hostName - A name for the host.
Returns:
An IP address for the host or null.

doLookup

public static org.xbill.DNS.Record[] doLookup(org.xbill.DNS.Resolver resol,
                                              org.xbill.DNS.Name name,
                                              int type)
Performs a DNS lookup bypassing the cache. It silently fails if it cannot do the query (returns lenght 0 array)

Parameters:
resol - A resolver to contact the DNS server.
name - A name for the record.
type - A type for the record.
Returns:
A (possibly zero length) array of result records.
Throws:
DNSException - if an error occurs

getResolver

public static org.xbill.DNS.Resolver getResolver(java.lang.String hostName)
                                          throws DNSException
Gets a resolver for DNS queries (port 53, use TCP).

Parameters:
hostName - A host name for the DNS server or null if we use the platform default.
Returns:
A resolver for DNS queries.
Throws:
DNSException - if an error occurs while getting a resolver to the name server.

getResolver

public static org.xbill.DNS.Resolver getResolver(java.lang.String hostName,
                                                 boolean useTCP,
                                                 int port)
                                          throws DNSException
Gets a resolver for DNS queries.

Parameters:
hostName - A host name for the DNS server or null if we use the platform default.
useTCP - Whether to use TCP for the query.
port - Port to use or -1 for the default.
Returns:
A resolver for DNS queries.
Throws:
DNSException - if an error occurs while getting a resolver to the name server.

cdToTXT

public static java.util.List cdToTXT(org.smartfrog.sfcore.componentdescription.ComponentDescription cd)
Converts a component description into a list of formatted strings that can be incorporated into a TXT DNS record. Non basic entries in the component description are ignored.

Parameters:
cd - A component description input.
Returns:
A list of strings that represent "lines" of a TXT DNS record.

txtToCD

public static org.smartfrog.sfcore.componentdescription.ComponentDescription txtToCD(java.util.List strings)
                                                                              throws DNSException
Converts a set of lines from a DNS TXT record into a component description.

Parameters:
strings - A set of lines from a DNS TXT record.
Returns:
A component description for that record.
Throws:
DNSException

canonicalBasic

public static java.lang.String canonicalBasic(java.lang.Object obj)
Returns a canonical string of a SF basic type. This is, a String, Float, Long, Integer, Double, Boolean or vector.

Parameters:
obj - An object of a basic type to canonicalize.
Returns:
A canonical string of a SF basic type.

canonicalVector

public static java.lang.String canonicalVector(java.util.Vector vector)
Returns a canonical string of a SF vector. All the elements of a SF vector need to be basic types.

Parameters:
vector - A SF vector to be canonicalized.
Returns:
A canonical string of a SF vector.

addEscapes

public static java.lang.String addEscapes(java.lang.String str)
Escapes special characters in a String so that they can be parsed back as a SmartFrog "string".

Parameters:
str - A string that we want to escape its special characters.
Returns:
The input string with special characters escaped.

canonicalString

public static java.lang.String canonicalString(java.lang.String str)
Returns a canonical string of a SF string, i.e., quoted and with escaped special characters.

Parameters:
str - A string to be canonicalized.
Returns:
a canonical string of a SF string.
